questions.question: What is delivery time?
questions.answer: Delivery time is normally 1 to 5 days with FEDEX depending on the country of destination. Please contact us for specific information

questions.question: Can I pay for my order with a credit card?
questions.answer: Unfortunately not. We do not accept credit card payments anymore as too few customers are using this means of payment

questions.question: Can I get a quote or an invoice in a different currency?
questions.answer: No, we do not provide documents labeled in currencies other than Euros. However upon request, the corresponding amounts in non-Euro currencies can be indicated on your quote or invoice at the current exchange rate. Please contact us for specific demands

questions.question: Can I get a discount on my order?
questions.answer: LaserBio Labs' pricing policy is to offer the right price for its products and not to artificially inflate the catalog list prices in order to offer discounts as a marketing strategy. Prices are therefore not discounted. For large orders superior to 1000.00 Euros, please contact us

questions.question: Will transit temperatures affect the performance of the products ?
questions.answer: No, as all products are shipped in dried form and are therefore insensitive to heat-induced degradation

questions.question: How should I store my products upon reception ?
questions.answer: Upon reception products should be stored according to recommendations (4°C for matrix and -20°C for calibrants and digests). See the kit brochure for specific instructions

questions.question: What is product lifetime ?
questions.answer:
We give our products a one-year expiration limit after they leave our facilities. However, if proper storage and handling recommendations are followed, product lifetime is much longer, up to several years
For products stored at -20°C after dilution in solvent, freeze/thaw cycles should be kept as short as possible

questions.question: Are there Materials Safety Data Sheets available ?
questions.answer:
Yes. For non-European customers, please contact us if the MSDS has not been forwarded by the shipping service
MSDS are not included in intra-European shipments, please contact us to obtain one
